Heh. Normal mode, huh? This'll be fun, Hero. Just

does make things more interesting, doesn't it~?

You have to be going easy on me for me to overpower

to beat me while you're bug-sized!
Well, I guess you're a tougher hero than I thought
That sure was fun, wasn't it? Did you enjoy looking up
my dress, you dirty Hero? I know I had fun looking
Come back any time for a rematch~!

Time for you to go squish! Game Over!

I guess I was a bit too big for you, Hero.
I'll have to fly over to the lake to wash off the
stain you left on my foot.
